title: Request lift of suspension of account
body:
Hi, I last played in 2014. Just tried to log in and apparently my account is permanently suspended, check my emails. I haven't received anything from riot regarding any infractions and was never a toxic player. Would love if I could log in again :) 
Thank you

replies.body: Try sending a support ticket mate.
Ahh, I was trying but it wouldn't work on my phone. I'll try it on PC. Hope it can be fixed, had human ryze on it and i wanna check out the reworks :o
